text: The Green Dome (), is a green dome built over the tombs of Muhammad, Caliph Abu Bakr and Umar. The dome is located in the south-east corner of the Nabawi Mosque in Medina. == Gallery == File:'Madinah Sharif' Indian token.jpg|17th century bronze coin depicting Mamluk era dome which preceded the current dome. File:Burton Nabi.gif|The Green Dome, in Burton's Pilgrimage, ca. 1850 CE File:Mrs Aisha room.jpg|The grave of Muhammad located inside the quarter seen here. == References == Category:Mosques in Saudi Arabia Category:Medina Category:13th-century buildings and structures
title: The Green Dome
